replies.body: Sounds good on paper, but what is going to inevitably happen is leveling up will be so far and few between that by the time you hit say level 100, it will be impossible to buy champions without actually buying RP. Instead of grinding for IP to get that new champion we all want, we will be rewarded with a chest every 40+ games (coz thats how long it will eventually take to level up) that might grant us 500 BE (assuming we get the right shard). Sounds all nice and fancy, but ultimately will result in the majority of the playerbase being forced to pay physical money for new or even old champions. Im sure Riot loves this idea though. Not to sound like a pessimist, but this new update could break this game, resulting in hundreds of thousands, and possibly millions, of players leaving league for other MOBAS. But only time will tell.

From this page:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/TscQzOL6-frequently-asked-questions-about-the-upcoming-leveling-and-rewards-changes-cross-post

"The leveling curve will get slightly harder and slower as you go, but it stops getting tougher once you reach level 150. Basically, the climb from levels 151 to 175 will take exactly as long as the climb from levels 176 through 200. Even at this highest, toughest level (like the jump from level 199 to 200), the average number of games you'll have to play between levels will be somewhere between 15 and 25 games."

also

"You can actually get multiple champion shards whenever you level up. If you get a low priced champion shard like Ashe, it will come with other shards to bring up the total value of the capsule. The capsules are balanced like this so that everyone will get close to the same value from hitting any given level, so luck won't make a difference to how quickly you can unlock champions."

SO basically if you're complaints with this new system revolve around never levelling up at higher levels, or never getting BE, you don't understand the system, and are probably wrong.

I like this update so far but one major thing about this update is the ability to get IP (now called BE) are rather difficult. If you think about it, it would be great Riot gives the champion skin shards from the loot a higher disenchanting value at the very least or give a higher drop rate for more costly champions so we get more disenchanting value every time we level up. Another thing is the leveling cap. It seems that the only driving force for levelling up is to receive BE from disenchanting skin shards. It actually doesn't sound enticing as most are rather pissed off with the value of BE we get per level which may vary due to how lucky you are; mostly low value. This makes levelling not really worth it. However, if Riot were to implement a milestone system for example at level 30 for newcomers, they will get 6300 BE instant. It would feel rewarding. They can also provide milestone every 10 levels which scales up starting from level 30, then 40, and then 50, etc. Unless you are reluctant, you can switch the BE suggestion to more loot boxes instead. 2 at level 30, 3 at level 40, 4 at level 50. Stopping at a maximum of 9 loot boxes which will be level 100 which I assume by then players would have collected all champions or most of it to a satisfactory amount.

WHAT WE WANT

- BE after games
- More on Champion Mastery (Rewards, Milestones, Champion Emotes etc)
- Make tanks do less damage
- Show Takedowns/CreepScore/Gameswon/played on profile for everyone
